name: antigravity-copilot
description: Use Google Antigravity models (Claude, Gemini) in GitHub Copilot Chat via CLIProxyAPI

antigravityCopilot.server.enabled.description: Enable the Antigravity server on startup

antigravityCopilot.server.autoStart.description: Automatically start the server when VS Code opens

antigravityCopilot.server.executablePath.description: Path to cli-proxy-api.exe (leave empty to auto-detect in %USERPROFILE%\CLIProxyAPI)

antigravityCopilot.autoConfigureCopilot.description: Automatically configure Copilot Chat custom models on startup

antigravityCopilot.rateLimit.enabled.description: Enable rate limiting to prevent 429 errors with Antigravity models

antigravityCopilot.rateLimit.cooldownMs.description: Cooldown period in milliseconds between requests (default: 15000ms for standard, 30000ms for thinking)

antigravityCopilot.rateLimit.intensity.description: Request intensity mode. 'standard' uses shorter cooldowns, 'thinking' uses longer cooldowns to prevent rate limits on heavy models
enumDescriptions: Thinking mode with 30 second cooldowns for resource-intensive models

antigravityCopilot.rateLimit.showNotific.description: Show notifications when requests are blocked due to rate limiting

antigravityCopilot.proxy.enabled.description: Enable a local throttling proxy (queues Copilot requests to reduce upstream 429s). When enabled, configured model URLs will point to this proxy instead of directly to CLIProxyAPI.

antigravityCopilot.proxy.host.description: Bind host for the throttling proxy server

antigravityCopilot.proxy.port.description: Bind port for the throttling proxy server

antigravityCopilot.proxy.rewriteMaxToken.description: When enabled, the proxy will clamp max output tokens in requests to reduce long generations that often trigger upstream 429s.

antigravityCopilot.proxy.maxTokensThinki.description: Maximum output tokens to allow for Thinking models when proxy rewriting is enabled

antigravityCopilot.proxy.maxTokensStanda.description: Maximum output tokens to allow for non-Thinking models when proxy rewriting is enabled

antigravityCopilot.proxy.logRequests.description: Log proxy request metadata (model, endpoint, token limits, status, duration). Does NOT log prompt text.

antigravityCopilot.proxy.transformThinki.description: Transform streaming responses from Thinking models to annotate reasoning_content for better client display

antigravityCopilot.proxy.thinkingTransfo.description: Transform mode for thinking content in streaming responses
enumDescriptions: Minimal: Add _is_thinking markers to delta objects
Enhanced: Add comprehensive thinking block markers in OpenAI format
Claude: Full conversion to Anthropic/Claude streaming format (experimental)
